text:
The Program Regulations shall contain procedures for the close of each Seismic Safety Loan, including required title insurance and endorsements for the benefit of the City. 
(Formerly Sec. 66A.16; added by Ord. 100-94, App. 3/11/94; renumbered by Ord. 2-01, File No. 001969, App. 1/12/2001)
(Former Sec. 66A.15 was renumbered as Sec. 66A.14 by Ord. 2-01.)
